  • Method Details

    • getMenusByStatus

      List<Menu> getMenusByStatus(String status)
      Retrieves a list of menus based on their status.
      Returns:
      A list of Menu objects representing the menus with the specified status.

    • getDishesByMenu

      List<Dish> getDishesByMenu(int menuID)
      Retrieves a list of dishes associated with a specific menu.
      Parameters:
      menuID - The ID of the menu to retrieve the dishes from.
      Returns:
      A list of Dish objects representing the dishes in the specified menu.

    • getDishDetails

      Dish getDishDetails(int dishID)
      Retrieves the details of a specific dish, including the associated wine information.
      Parameters:
      dishID - The ID of the dish to retrieve the details for.
      Returns:
      A Dish object representing the details of the specified dish, including the associated wine information.

    • getWineByDish

      Wine getWineByDish(int dishID)
      Retrieves the wine associated with a specific dish.
      Parameters:
      dishID - The ID of the dish to retrieve the associated wine for.
      Returns:
      A Wine object representing the wine associated with the specified dish, including its name, type, quantity, and price.

    • getDishPrice

      double getDishPrice(int dishID)
      Retrieves the price of a specific dish.
      Parameters:
      dishID - The ID of the dish to retrieve the price for.
      Returns:
      The price of the specified dish.

    • getWinePrice

      double getWinePrice(int wineID)
      Retrieves the price of a specific wine.
      Parameters:
      wineID - The ID of the wine to retrieve the price for.
      Returns:
      The price of the specified wine.

    • getWineQuantity

      int getWineQuantity(int wineID)
      Retrieves the quantity of a specific wine in stock.
      Parameters:
      wineID - The ID of the wine to retrieve the quantity for.
      Returns:
      The quantity of the specified wine in stock.

    • getStaffByRole

      List<StaffInfo> getStaffByRole(String role)
      Retrieves a list of staff members with the specified role.
      Parameters:
      role - The role to filter the staff members by.
      Returns:
      A list of StaffInfo objects representing the staff members with the specified role.

    • getStaffSchedule

      List<Schedule> getStaffSchedule(int staffID)
      Retrieves the schedule of a specific staff member.
      Parameters:
      staffID - The ID of the staff member to retrieve the schedule for.
      Returns:
      A list of StaffSchedule objects representing the schedule of the specified staff member.

    • assignWaiterToTable

      boolean assignWaiterToTable(String staffName, int tableID)
      Assigns a staff member with the role "waiter" to a specific table.
      Parameters:
      staffName - The name of the staff member to assign to the table.
      tableID - The ID of the table to assign the staff member to.
      Returns:
      true if the assignment is successful, false otherwise.

    • getStaffHolidaysWithinDateRange

      List<StaffHolidayAssociation> getStaffHolidaysWithinDateRange(LocalDate startDate, LocalDate endDate)
      Retrieves the staff members on holiday within a specified date range.
      Parameters:
      startDate - The start date of the date range (inclusive).
      endDate - The end date of the date range (inclusive).
      Returns:
      A list of StaffHoliday objects representing the staff members on holiday within the specified date range.
